message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $18,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my research, I believe $12,000 would be a fair price for the product. Please let me know if this is possible.
